text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Mr Trump @realDonaldTrump  is under mounting pressure over the rising coronavirus death toll in the United States. He needs to be straight, he needs to forget the bluff, bluster, politics, threats, insinuations and the blame game. He needs to lead.
